episode_summary: In this episode, Anna DeSimone discusses the persistent issue of mortgage discrimination and the role of REALTORS in closing the home ownership gap. She emphasizes the importance of educating clients, especially first-generation home buyers, and highlights lost opportunities in home ownership. The conversation also touches on the impact of the NAR settlement on the real estate industry and potential adjustments needed.
